content.raw:
I fixed the bullet warning in 3c60cfc.

Aside from that, I see your point. My intent was to provide a warning that would appear only when the user enables the `View Center of Mass / Inertia` option on a model with strange inertia. However, it was appearing upon loading the world with no regard to the current view options.

I had converted it back to gzlog, but it can be removed if you prefer.
content.html:
I fixed the bullet warning in 3c60cfc.

Aside from that, I see your point. My intent was to provide a warning that would appear only when the user enables the View Center of Mass / Inertia option on a model with strange inertia. However, it was appearing upon loading the world with no regard to the current view options.

I had converted it back to gzlog, but it can be removed if you prefer.
